phrases: Do not take your eyes off of theirs!
There is nothing to be afraid of.
Gohan, do not lose your nerve!
This time, shall we take the fight to them?
Were not there only supposed to be two Saiyans?
It looks like there are more of them.
However many there are, it is all the same.
He appears to have been trained quite a bit by Piccolo.
He is got a fine look to him.
I guess we are all here, except for Goku.
The exact number of Saibaimen that we have here.
How about you all take turns fighting each one of our soldiers?
Stop beating around the bush and let us settle this right here and now!
Now, now, where is the harm?
It works out better for our side to do it this way.
Goku has not arrived yet, after all.
He is going to be bowled over once he realizes how strong the Saibaimen are!
So, which one of you is going to face me?
Hammer him with all you have got.
We are going to start reporting from above the scene now...
These Saiyans appear to possess tremendous power.
You idiot!'course everything are not all right!
L- like I said, my boys're fightin' with'them for your sakes right now!
-Who do you mean when you say my boys ?
-Will not you be surprised when I tell ya!
The winner of the Tenkaichi Tournament, Son Goku.
With him're Tenshinhan, and Piccolo, as well.
There is a good chance that this will be my last meal...
Muten Roshi- sama, are you sure that Goku has been returned to life?
He should be heading to where Piccolo and the others are, right now.
Muten Roshi- sama, where is my Gohan?
He is still with Piccolo and the others.
Saibaimen have a battle power of 1200.
They are on par with Raditz, as far as power goes!
His battle power must be higher than that.
That was not in our data...
Nappa, it looks like these guys are going to be somewhat entertaining.
W - what is this strange uneasiness l'm feeling?
l've got a bad feeling about this.
Piccolo, hang in there somehow until I get back!
Anything more would be a waste of time.
That Saibaiman took him too lightly when he attacked.
I told him to go at it with everything he is got.
H- how could he do that!?
T - that Saiyan blew that monster to bits in the blink of an eye!
We will be okay from here.
This special lens is working out great!
There is so much energy colliding in the area, we cannot get very close.
This is almost as if the end of the world were approaching, it is such a spectacle.
Now, who is going to be next?
You guys, go all-out from the start this time!
I want to show them that we have had enough of their games.
Yamucha- san, l can do that-
You have already been brought back to life once by the Dragon Balls.
Supposing that the unthinkable happens, you could not come back to life again.
I am going to take care of the other five all at the same time.
What a beautiful friendship you must have.
All right, you take him on.
Do not you take us so lightly!
These are the Saiyans that have plunged us into depths of terror!
It is one of the regulars from the Tenkaichi Tournament!
Yamucha- sama's face is looking even tougher now, is not it?
It is not just his face.
His abilities are a lot greater now, too.
Bulma, you are taken with him again, are not you?
Once they defeat the Saiyans, you could get married, could not you, Bulma- san?
Y- you do not mean- I mean, marriage!
Oh, that is the face of Piccolo Daimao!
He is lookin' a lot tougher, huh?
Look at how you have become...
G- Gohan- chan is in the same place as those revoltin' monsters?
W- why is not Goku there?
They are moving at high speed!
Try feeling out the movement of their Ki.
T- the movement of their Ki?
Everyone except for you can see them.
Use your whole body as your eyes.
My whole body as my eyes?
Looks like these monsters are not as strong as you think they are.
I will take care of the other four by myself, too.
It appears that this time, you are the ones who took the Saibaimen too lightly.
W- what is wrong with Yamucha?
I could not hear what he said.
Y- Yamucha- san must have had a bad feeling about this.
T- that is why he went in my place.
What do I tell Pu-erh and Bulma- san!?
What a pathetic Saibaiman- ending in a draw!
What did he think he was doing, against scum like that!?
He is polluting up the place.
I will avenge you, no matter what!
Let me show you the results of my training!
Having watched Yamucha die before his eyes, Kuririn's fury has erupted!
What were the results of his training?
